text:
Education: B.Tech. in Computer Science from IIT Roorkee
Years of Experience: 0
Prior Experience: Interned at Morgan Stanley, Zomato
Date of the Offer: January 2021
Company: Optiver
Title/Level: Software Engineer
Location: Chicago, IL
Salary: $128,000
Relocation: $30,000
Signing Bonus: $5,000
Stock bonus: $90K stock grant vested over 3.5 years
Bonus: Performance-based bonus up to 20% of salary every year
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~$150K
Benefits: 15 paid vacation days + 10 paid sick leave days + 10 paid U.S. holidays + 2 paid personal days + yearly sports stipend of $800 to spend on sports stuff or free gym membership + 50% 401k/Roth match up to $9k/yr + covered health/dental/vision
Other details: Negotiated once, original offer did not have signing bonus. Was given two weeks to accept or decline the offer.
